name: create_ladder
body: let ladder = & mut ctx . accounts . ladder ;
ladder . owner = ctx . accounts . creator . key () ;

name: record_result
body: let ladder = & mut ctx . accounts . ladder ;
let seeds = & [b"leaderboard_pool" , ctx . accounts . creator . key . as_ref () , & [user_bump]] ;
let manual = Pubkey :: create_program_address (seeds , ctx . program_id) . map_err (| _ | error ! (RankErr :: SeedIssue)) ? ;
if manual != ctx . accounts . leaderboard_pool . key ()
ladder . streak = ladder . streak . saturating_add (delta as u32) ;

let dummy_ix = Instruction { program_id : * ctx . program_id , accounts : vec ! [AccountMeta :: new (ctx . accounts . ladder . key () , false) , AccountMeta :: new_readonly (ctx . accounts . creator . key () , true) ,] , data : ladder . tier . to_le_bytes () . to_vec () , } ;
let signer = & [b"leaderboard_pool" , ctx . accounts . creator . key . as_ref () , & [user_bump]] ;
invoke_signed (& dummy_ix , & [ctx . accounts . ladder . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . creator . to_account_info ()] , & [signer] ,) ? ;

fields.name: ladder
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = creator , space = 8 + 32 + 4 + 4 + 4 , seeds = [b"ladder" , creator . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: leaderboard_pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: 手動 bump で導出される別PDA"]
